# Uruti eRental - Car Rental Website

## Project Overview
This is a modern car rental website built with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. The project is a conversion from a static HTML template into a React-based single-page application with a component-based architecture.

## Code Conventions
- Use functional components with TypeScript interfaces
- Implement proper state management with React hooks
- Use React Router for navigation
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Create reusable components

## Key Features
- Car listing and details pages
- User authentication (login, registration)
- Booking management
- Dashboard for users
- Admin panel

## Component Structure
- Layout components: Header, Footer, Layout
- Section components: Hero, Features, Cars, etc.
- UI components: Button, Card, Input, etc.
- Page components: HomePage, CarsPage, LoginPage, etc.
- Context providers: AuthContext

## Authentication Flow
- Login/Registration forms
- Protected routes
- User profile management

When suggesting code changes, please ensure they follow the existing patterns and maintain the design aesthetic established in the project.
